metadata.subject: Censorship
metadata.title: Ordonnance de Son Eminence Monseigneur le Cardinal de Noailles, Archevesque de Paris: portant condamnation d'un imprimé intitulé, Cas de conscience proposé par un confesseur de province, touchant un ecclesiastique, qui est sous sa conduite, & résolu par plusieurs docteurs de la Faculté de theologie de Paris
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Archdiocese of Paris (France).Archbishop (1695-1729 : Noailles)
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1695-1729 : Noailles)
Eustace, abbé. Cas de conscience
Couet, Bernard, 1666-1736. Cas de consciende
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 3 no. 7
metadata.description: The work in question is variously atributed to Abbé Eustace, or Bernard Couet
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Damaged, torn, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Title page and cover are combined.
